childMarkdownRemark.html:
In celebration of the Holy month of Ramadan, Qatar Foundation for Education, Science and Community Development has launched a two-week Instagram photo competition.

Participants will need to keep an eye out for pictures posted on the Foundation’s official Instagram account, @QatarFoundation, as part of a daily Ramadan-themed photo collage. Once they have deciphered the clue to the theme in the photo, participants should submit the right answer by leaving a comment on the photo in either English or Arabic.

The first five followers to comment with the right answer win that day’s competition and are awarded points as follows: the 1st answer = 10 points; the 2nd answer = 8 points, the 3rd answer = 6 points; the 4th answer = 4 points and the 5th answer = 2 points. This competition is running exclusively on Instagram; submissions via Facebook or Twitter will not be counted.

Two competition winners will be declared, depending on whoever accumulates the most points by the end of each week with two prizes up for grabs: a speaking encyclopaedia of Quranic sciences, and a book about The Prophet Muhammad’s belongings (Peace be upon Him).

For further information on this competition, please contact Mahmoud Aldwairi at maldwairi@qf.org.qa

To read the competition rules, please click here.
